title: Directs the court to consider certain factors when determining the issuance of an order for recognizance or bail
summary: Directs the court to consider certain factors when determining the issuance of an order for recognizance or bail where a principal is charged with a crime against a family or household member, in matters where the court has discretion; and directs the court to consider the danger of intimidation or injury by the principal to a witness.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to the consideration of certain factors when determining the issuance of an order of recognizance or bail
